mapper.sql: block_id, hash, difficulty, Transactions, height, version, Timestamp, "transaction volume", mined, size, weight, "block Reward", "fee Reward"
mapper.insert: insert into block (block_id, hash, difficulty, Transactions, height, version, Timestamp, "transaction volume", mined, size, weight, "block Reward", "fee Reward") values (#{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transactions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transactionVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mined,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blockReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{feeReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

mapper.update:
update block
hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Transactions = #{transactions,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
"transaction volume" = #{transactionVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mined = #{mined,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
"block Reward" = #{blockReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
"fee Reward" = #{feeReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update block set hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Transactions = #{transactions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "transaction volume" = #{transactionVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, mined = #{mined,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "block Reward" = #{blockReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, "fee Reward" = #{feeReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
